Reviews.Title: “Good Crash Pad - Nice Central Location on the Amstel River”
Reviews.Author: Doodyjazz
Reviews.Content: stayed night didnt spend time nice stay location rembrandtplein amstel river city easy trams busses stop rembrandtplein minutes clean private bathrooms bring breakfast morning close cafes cafe de river beautiful terras water front door mulligans irish music bar fun coffeeshop surrounded nightlife activities little noisy major vending machines lobby bier bonus returning 3am cafes closed means fancy frilly crash pad adventurer excellent location value town

Reviews.Title: “noisy hotel”
Reviews.Author: GA L Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: hotel value money serve breakfast isnt mend site hotel hotel situated near rembrandtplein alley near hotel busy drunk people heard clean hotel people people

Reviews.Title: “would not return”
Reviews.Author: juliejones30
Reviews.Content: 4 staying night location plenty space inside apartment dated run awful decor furnishings fair werent waste money luxorious price

Reviews.Title: “100 euros a night for a broom cupboard - smallest room I have ever stayed in”
Reviews.Author: JoGUK
Reviews.Content: 100 euros night clean breakfast delivered adequate due lack space difficult sit eat chair narrow dressing table narrow window ledge complex manoeuvre lot noise bass night due location hotel central amenities

Reviews.Title: “Boom Boom Boom there goes the nightclub”
Reviews.Author: REC001
Reviews.Content: basic hotel location centre except largest nightclub amsterdam reception attic ladder cheap youve pay hand ready try blag money charges kept changing throughout conversation pretty probably

Reviews.Title: “Cant attract people so they thrive on scamming prospective clients...”
Reviews.Author: PRM
Reviews.Content: unprofessional staff attentive email request reservation receipt credit card details 1 confirmed reservation despite repeated requests 2 sent cancellation notice reservation 3 months prior travel 3 proceeded bill credit card reservation receiving cancellation notice despite sending copies dated emails requesting provide similar evidence responded confirmation refuse reverse credit card charges

Reviews.Title: “Horrible and noisy all night long”
Reviews.Author: CanadaTravelor
Reviews.Content: stayed window bar played loud music night couldnt sleep nights hotel staff rude money ans didnt care able sleep dont stay hotel save yourself headache

Reviews.Title: “DO NOT GIVE THEM YOUR CREDIT CARD! They will scam you”
Reviews.Author: ftbl616
Reviews.Content: hotel absolutely terrible credit card info hold reservation paid cash arrival left hotel charged credit card 300 euros damage fraud damaged stay try scam
